description_fr:
MARS GAMING MKMINIPRO, HOT-SWAPPABLE RGB MECHANICAL GATERON BLUE

The MARS GAMING MKMINIPRO keyboard offers a powerful combination of compact design, customization, and performance for dedicated gamers and productivity enthusiasts alike. With its ultra-compact 60% form factor, this keyboard is ideal for those who want to optimize desk space without sacrificing functionality. Its hot-swappable mechanical switches allow users to tailor their typing experience,The MKMINIPRO also includes four extra switches and specialized tools for seamless key and switch swapping, making customization easy and enhancing the keyboard’s longevity.

Equipped with vibrant RGB Chroma lighting, the MKMINIPRO offers a visually stunning experience with 16.8 million color options and customizable lighting effects. Its advanced RGB lighting, on both the back and sides, provides an immersive ambiance that adapts to any setup. The MKMINIPRO integrates QuietCore technology with dampening foam, significantly reducing typing noise for a quieter experience, ideal for both gaming and professional environments.

The MKMINIPRO is engineered for gaming with a 1000Hz polling rate and full anti-ghosting technology, ensuring each keystroke is registered accurately, even during fast-paced gameplay. Its advanced control software (available on Windows) allows full customization of lighting and macros, offering gamers precise control over their setup. Compatible with multiple platforms, including Windows, Linux, Mac, PS4, PS5, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch, the MKMINIPRO provides a versatile, seamless experience on nearly any device.

Built to last, the MKMINIPRO’s ABS structure and double-injection keys ensure durability, while the rubber-coated detachable USB-C cable enhances portability. For those who seek a quiet, highly customizable, and ultra-compact keyboard that doesn’t compromise on features, the MKMINIPRO is the ultimate choice.
miniDescription_fr:
• Weight: 480g

  • Design: 60% mini

  • Wire Length: 150cm

  • Polling Rate: 1000Hz
  • Anti-Ghosting: Yes (total)
  • Software Compatibility: Windows
  • Platform Compatibility: Windows, *Linux, *Mac, PS4, PS5, XBOX ONE, XBOX SERIES X-S, Nintendo Switch *(Some functions may not work due to OS limitations.)
  • Voltage: DC 5V
  • Current: 300mA
  • Lifespan: 50 million keystrokes
  • Cable Type: Rubber-coated
  • Keys: Double injection
